content: {"Name": "Bread of Life Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 128, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Messiah Lutheran Bread of Life Food Pantry", "More_Information": "Appointment only, please call to schedule. Guests can visit once a month\r\nProduce exclusive day: Friday 4:30pm, open to the public.", "Counties": ["Schenectady"], "Location": "Rotterdam Community Center", "Address": "705 Curry Rd", "City": "Rotterdam", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12306", "Phone": "(518) 364-3205", "Hours_of_Operation": "2nd and 4th Monday 3:00pm - 8:00pm, 3rd Monday 9:00am-2:00pm, 4th Saturday 9:00am -2:00pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://rotterdamcc.org/food-pantries", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.78903649955081", "Longitude": "-73.97749990189908", "Last_Updated": "04-02-2025", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
